articles.description: Whether you have bought a Galaxy smartphone before or are a first-time buyer, buying a Samsung handset is a complex process and there is a lot to consider.
articles.content: If you walk into a shopping mall, you spend a great amount of time running from one store to another than actually buying a product. Samsung is just like your neighbourhood mall; it offers the maximu… [+9899 chars]
